meanings.sent1: The dog left some doodoo on the grass.
meanings.sent2: Please clean up after your pet's doodoo.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally stepped in doodoo at the park.
meanings.sent4: The smell of doodoo filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The toddler mistook the doodoo for chocolate and tried to eat it.

meanings.sent1: His doodoo at the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: Don't engage in doodoo if you want to be taken seriously.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's doodoo had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent4: Her doodoo was so ridiculous, it was hard to believe.
meanings.sent5: The children's doodoo brightened up the dull meeting.

meanings.sent1: He tried to doodoo his way out of trouble.
meanings.sent2: She doodooed him into believing her story.
meanings.sent3: The magician doodooed the audience with his tricks.
meanings.sent4: The scammer doodooed many people out of their money.
meanings.sent5: The fox doodooed the rabbit into coming out of its burrow.
